name: Kom-Panyon
description:
Kom-Panyon was made for the GMTK Jam 2021, it's about keeping Panyon and Kom connected, so Panyon can attack on Koms command.

A short platformer about companionship.

Controls
  • WD or ArrowKeys to run
  • Space to Jump
  • Left Mouse Click to attack
  • Right Mouse Click to dodge
  • R to restart the level
Credits
  • Art and sound used are from Craftpix
  • Game music from Opengameart at Adventure-begins by bart
  • Ending music from Opengameart at town-theme-rpg by cynicmusic
  • Font by Kenney
